dcterms:description: nuScenes is a large autonomous driving dataset comprising 1000 video clips collected in diverse road scenes and weather conditions. These scenes are pretty challenging, with a fair amount of unexpected regions.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: RobotCar is a large-scale autonomous driving dataset including driving videos captured on a consistent route during various weather conditions, traffic conditions, and times of day and night.
dcterms:title: RobotCar

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: CARLA-EPE is a photo-realistically enhanced nighttime dataset based upon CARLA, which provides dense depth ground truth and photo-realistic images, bringing meaningful new challenges to the community.
dcterms:title: CARLA-EPE

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: KITTI is a dataset that combines vision and robotics, providing a benchmark for various tasks in autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: Cityscapes is a dataset for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various urban scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: L. Jing
R. Yu
H. Kretzschmar

dcterms:description: DDAD focuses on improving per-object depth estimation for monocular 3D detection and tracking, emphasizing the importance of depth estimation.
dcterms:title: DDAD

dcterms:creator: C. Sakaridis
D. Dai
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: DarkZurich is a dataset designed for semantic nighttime image segmentation, focusing on map-guided curriculum domain adaptation and uncertainty-aware evaluation.
dcterms:title: DarkZurich
